text: 11.9 Stt 12.8, 13.3, 13.18, 18.1, 18.9, 26.3, 35.12, 35.27, Hib 6.17 Ne God nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd nɨm, man awl olap God nop aglɨnɨgebin agak ak amɨl pelpel yolɨgup. Pen am yek anɨb ak man ne mel, binɨb ogɨnap man kɨli. Ne anɨgɨl mɨdɨl, sel kal gɨl kɨn ajolɨgup. Bɨ Aysak ayɨp bɨ Jekop ayɨp, omɨŋal gɨl God kɨlop abe agak, Man awl anɨb ak nɨbop aglɨpin agak ak, sel kal gɨl kɨn ajelɨgɨpil.
